attributes.action: No money, benefits, or luxuries  for prisoners
attributes.additional_details: I think it is time prisoners benefits and money were stopped. They should be made to work for their food. They have it far too easy in prisons these days. It is more like being in a hotel than serving time for a criminal offence. All their luxury items should be taken away and stopped, and once you are convicted of an offence you should automatically lose your human rights for the term of your conviction.WE MUST STOP BEING SOFT ON CRIMINALS.
